akn:section.akn:heading: Prohibition on construction of buildings except by Administrator of General Services

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3302. Prohibition on construction of buildings except by Administrator of General Services Only the Administrator of General Services may construct a public building. The Administrator shall construct a public building in accordance with this chapter. (Pub. L. 107–217, Aug. 21, 2002, 116 Stat. 1158.)
